section.title: Accessing the Console
section.para: Log in to the CloudForms Management Engine Console using the following procedure.

procedure.title: To Access the CloudForms Management Engine Console

step.para: From a computer with network access to the CloudForms Management Engine Appliance, open your Web browser.
Go to https://<CloudForms Management Engine Appliance IP>.
Read and accept any security certificate dialogs.
Log in to the Console with a user name of admin and the default password of smartvm.

formalpara.title: Result:
formalpara.para: The CloudForms Management Engine Console now displays.

important.para: Change your default password immediately after logging in for the first time.
